App Name: QR & Barcode Reader Package Name: com.teacapps.barcodescanner

Brief

QR & Barcode Reader is a versatile app designed to read various barcode formats quickly and easily. With its user-friendly interface, it operates smoothly on Android devices, providing safe and efficient scanning options for personal and business use.

Core Features

  • üìã Diverse Barcode Support: Reads QR, Data Matrix, Aztec, UPC, EAN, Code 39, and more.
  • üîó Relevant Actions: Open URLs, connect WiFi, add calendar events, and access product information.
  • üîí Security and Performance: Features Chrome Custom Tabs with Google Safe Browsing for secure scans.
  • üéØ Minimal Permissions: Offers privacy-conscious scanning without unnecessary access to device storage.
  • üñºÔ∏è Scan From Images: Detects codes within images or directly from the camera.

Pros

  • üëç User Safety: Prioritizes user safety with protective features against malicious links.
  • üëç Versatility: Can handle a broad range of barcode formats for various needs.
  • üëç Convenience: Operates with minimal permissions, respecting user privacy.
  • üëç Utility Features: Equipped with flashlight and zoom for scans in challenging conditions.
  • üëç Data Management: Allows for the export of scan history and annotations, facilitating data usage.

Cons

  • üëé Device Compatibility: Exclusively for Android 6.0 and higher, may not support older devices.
  • üëé Storage Access: While it operates with minimal permissions, some features may require storage access.
  • üëé Learning Curve: New users might need some time to familiarize themselves with advanced features.
  • üëé Ad Dependency: May include ads which could be intrusive for the user experience.
  • üëé Internet Reliance: Some functions might need an internet connection, limiting offline use.

Price

  • üíµ The app is free to download, but may offer in-app purchases for advanced features.

Enjoy a smooth and secure barcode scanning experience with QR & Barcode Reader, making data capture and processing on your Android device convenient and reliable.
